title: Kourtney Kardashian treats herself to a movie night for one
title_page: Kourtney Kardashian treats herself to a movie night for one | Daily Mail Online
text:
Sometimes we all just need a night to ourselves.
While usually a Netflix night next to an open fire may lead to some serious 'chilling' with someone special, Kourtney Kardashian brought the real meaning of the word 'chill' back for a night of relaxation on Thursday evening.
While the 37-year-old has been hitting Hollywood's party scene quite a lot recently, she had a night off for a change staying in and watching 2001 hit Blow instead.
Scroll down for video
Movie night: Kourtney Kardashian stayed in on Thursday night to watch the film Blow
Party gal: the 37-year-old has been hitting Hollywood's party scene quite a lot recently and on Wednesday night headed to The Nice Guy in West Hollywood, California
Positing a picture of her evening on Instagram, the mother of three's night looked like a little slice of heaven.
In the snap, which she posted late Thursday, the reality star had the perfect set up - a roaring fire courtesy of our designer gas fireplace and Blow in her giant flat screen television which was perfectly positioned above the heat source.
Clearly a big fan of the film, Kourt later posted a promotional picture of the movie's two stars, Johnny Depp and Penelope Cruz, seductively lying in each other's arms covered in money.
Perhaps wishing she did have someone there to 'chill' with, Kourtney captioned the snap mood.
'Mood': Clearly a big fan of the film, Kourt later posted a promotional picture of the movie's two stars, Johnny Depp and Penelope Cruz, seductively lying in each other's arms covered in money
It appears the star was not alone all night, as at some point Khloe must have popped in as Kourtney also reveled a doodle she and her sister had done which had their names combined, they said, equals love.
On the piece of paper was also the Twilight quote: 'Without the dark, we'd never see the stars.'
Of course both Kourtney and Khloe have been through tough times recently; Kourtney's relationship with her children's father, Scott Disick, broke down and Khloe has been by estranged husband Lamar's bedside for months after he overdosed.
Love for two: It appears the star was not alone all night, as at some point Khloe must have popped in as Kourtney also reveled a doodle she and hers sister had done
But Kourtney has certainly found some light in her darkness as a single lady.
Once a homebody leaving clubs and nights out to her sisters, Kourt has been a regular on the Hollywood scene of late.
On Wednesday night, the 37-year-old was seen headed to restaurant The Nice Guy in West Hollywood, California.
Keeping up: While her sisters are usually the ones headed out, since becoming single the reality star has been more adventurous
The Keeping Up With The Kardashians star was looking fantastic in a sheer maroon lace bodysuit with black pants.
This was fortunate as her reported much younger 'fling' Justin Bieber also stopped by the establishment.
It is not clear of the pair saw each other inside the small eatery turned bar, but Justin - who has now moved on with Hailey Baldwin - was later seen at Hollywood nightclub Warwick with his male pals.
